attributes.action: Tell Coe to send the 2012 olympic mountainbiking to Wales
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
2012 is an opportunity to showcase the best of British mountainbiking, the UCI have already said Weald country park is unsuitable, most mtbers consider it a joke. The IOC say it has to be 3hrs from London; South Wales it is then. 
I know its not Cardiff 2012 but lets show the best the UK has 2 offer.
